original_title: El futuro es un ángel y una sonrisa
overview: Martín Garabal is the best employee of Garabal and sons, his father's real state agency. Leonardo envies him deeply, Tomás admires him and Eva loves him. But something is wrong, the world seems to be telling Martín that he should take a different path. Martín doesn't listen because he's worried about his dad but, where is he?
tagline: One day you have it all, the next you have nothing
title: The Future is an Angel and a Smile
